items.content_html: Overide (pronounced over¬∑ide) is a lightweight, yet powerful CLI tool that seamlessly integrates AI-powered code generation into your development workflow. It works platform-agnostically with OpenAI, DeepSeek, and Groq to provide intelligent code updates directly in your preferred code editor - no extensions required.
items.title: oi-overide/oi: Overide (pronounced over¬∑ide) is a lightweight, yet powerful CLI tool that seamlessly integrates AI-powered code generation into your development workflow. It works platform-agnostically with OpenAI, DeepSeek, and Groq to provide intelligent code updates directly in your preferred code editor - no extensions required.

items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. items.content_html: Elmio is a lightweight, proof-of-concept web framework inspired by The Elm Architecture. It's built using the Rust programming language and compiles to WebAssembly.
items.title: xosnrdev/elmio: Elmio is a lightweight, proof-of-concept web framework inspired by The Elm Architecture. It's built using the Rust programming language and compiles to WebAssembly.

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: ToPDF is a lightweight, user-friendly tool for converting HTML content into downloadable PDF files. Built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS, it provides a streamlined experience for transforming web content into shareable, high-quality PDFs.
items.title: dextor-io/topdf.dextor.io: ToPDF is a lightweight, user-friendly tool for converting HTML content into downloadable PDF files. Built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS, it provides a streamlined experience for transforming web content into shareable, high-quality PDFs.
